description.value:
Through your heritage, you can replicate some of a hag's magic. Choose one common spell of 4th level or lower from those available to a coven, including the spells contributed to a coven by a hag of your mother's type. You can cast this spell once per day as a 4th-level occult innate spell.

Spells available to all covens are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Augury], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Charm], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Clairaudience], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Clairvoyance], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Dream Message], and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Illusory Disguise].

The eligible spells granted by the most prominent types of hag are:

  • Sea Hag @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Acid Arrow], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Water Walk]
  • Green Hag @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Entangle], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Outcast's Curse], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Wall of Thorns]
  • Annis Hag @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Earthbind]
  • Night Hag @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Nightmare]
